sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const UserProfile = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const getI = async () => { const stats = await getInfo() setUser(stats) } getI() }, []) const getInfo = async () => { const res = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/userinfo/${sessionStorage.getItem("tokenId")}`) const data = await res.json() console.log(data.name) return data } const submit = e => { e.preventDefault() fetch('/api', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({ user }), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(json => setUser(json.user)) } return (
Change Photo
setUser({ ...user, name: e.target.value })} id="name">

Body Information

setUser({ ...user, age: e.target.value })} className="form-control userInfo" id="age" placeholder="21">
setUser({ ...user, height: e.target.value })} className="form-control userInfo" id="Height" placeholder="21">
setUser({ ...user, weight: e.target.value })} className="form-control userInfo" id="Weight" placeholder="21">
setUser({ ...user, waist: e.target.value })} className="form-control userInfo" id="Waist" placeholder="21">
setUser({ ...user, chest: e.target.value })} className="form-control userInfo" id="Chest" placeholder="21">
setUser({ ...user, hand: e.target.value })} className="form-control userInfo" id="Hand" placeholder="21">
setUser({ ...user, leg: e.target.value })} className="form-control userInfo" id="leg" placeholder="21">
) } export default UserProfile
